properties.comment: These are the preamble snippets needed for handling the integer sort
properties.entry:
(assert (forall ((i Int)) (= (u2i (i2u i)) i)))
(assert (forall ((x U)) (=> (exactinstanceof x sort_int) (= (i2u (u2i x)) x))))
(assert (forall ((x U)) (! (=> (instanceof x sort_int) (exactinstanceof x sort_int)) :pattern ((instanceof x sort_int)))))
(assert (forall ((i Int)) (exactinstanceof (i2u i) sort_int)))
(declare-fun u2i (U) Int) (declare-fun i2u (Int) U) (declare-const sort_int T)
(define-fun jdiv ((n Int)(d Int)) Int (ite (>= n 0) (div n d) (div (* (- 1) n) (* (- 1) d))))
